    backup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backup_name VARCHAR(255),

);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE backups (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    backup_name VARCHAR(255),
    backup_path TEXT,
    backup_size INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE backup_schedule (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_name VARCHAR(255),
    backup_time TIME,
    repeat_interval INTERVAL,
    last_run TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE backup_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    backup_id UUID,
    backup_status VARCHAR(50),
    log_details TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    scheduled_time TIME,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE task_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE backups SET backup_name = 'DailyBackup1' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
